title: How To Find Low Competition Keywords In 6 Steps [Get More Traffic]

tactics.name: seed_keyword_brainstorming
tactics.description: Generate a list of core keywords relevant to your niche to serve as a foundation for low competition keyword research.
steps: Extract keywords from your website content
Use seed keywords as a basis for expansion
caveats: Low search volume may deter some SEOs, but aggregated traffic can match high volume keywords
source_quotes: low competition keywords are much easier to rank for and you can start getting search traffic in a quicker time frame

tactics.name: keyword_expansion
tactics.description: Expand seed keywords into longer, more specific terms using keyword research tools.
steps: Input seed keywords into keyword planners
caveats: Ensure expanded keywords align with your content capabilities
source_quotes: the traffic driven from five of these niche keywords may equate to the same volume of traffic you'd receive from ranking at the top of the search results for one generic high volume keyword

tactics.name: Ahrefs Content Explorer Filter
tactics.description: Identify low competition keywords by filtering referring domains and page traffic using Ahrefs Content Explorer.
steps: Set page traffic over 500 organic searches
caveats: High difficulty keywords may still require significant resources
source_quotes: set the referring domains lower than 10 because we want these to be as low as possible to give us the best chance of ranking

heuristics.name: difficulty_based_ranking
heuristics.condition: If keyword difficulty is below 30, prioritize for ranking
source_quotes: the lower the keyword difficulty the easier it is to rank for that keyword

heuristics.name: Low Authority Backlink Filter
heuristics.condition: If referring domains have low domain ratings, prioritize these keywords
source_quotes: the referring domains to the second search result have low dr's which would suggest that this is a good keyword to target

claims.statement: Low competition keywords can generate significant traffic even with low search volume
source_quotes: the traffic driven from five of these niche keywords may equate to the same volume of traffic you'd receive from ranking at the top of the search results for one generic high volume keyword

claims.statement: High difficulty keywords have significantly higher search volumes and conversion potential.
source_quotes: the high difficulty keywords are so difficult to rank for because they have much higher search volumes

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs within broader niches to capture low competition keywords
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with search intent and reduces competition while maintaining relevance
source_quotes: if the search is more detailed than the customer is much closer to converting

niche_patterns.example: SEO services + small business + low competition keywords
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audiences with services that have lower competition but still viable traffic potential
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines niche audience targeting with low competition keywords for better ranking chances
source_quotes: the dr of the linking sites is actually really high so they have a good number of high quality meaning that this search term is actually going to be pretty difficult to rank for
